name: Customizer Toolkits
author: Ashathemes

sections.description:
Customizer Toolkits is a nice wordpress plugin. You can use this plugin any wordpress site for create Customizer Options. Customizer Toolkits is one of the most user friendly wordpress plugin.

Features

  • Super Easy Customization
  • Light-weight WordPress Plugin
  • Increased Performance
  • Simplified API
  • Conditional Logic
  • Improved Page Speed
  • & more!

Customizer Controls

  • Blogpage Settings
    • List Blog
      • Left Sidebar
      • Right Sidebar
      • Full Width
    • Gird Blog
      • Two Column
      • Three Column
    • Display Post Date
    • Display Post By
    • Display Post Category
    • Display Post Tags
    • Display Post Comment Count
    • Display Post Next Previous Button
    • Display Post Navigation or Pagination
  • Singlepage Settings
    • Singlepage layout
      • Left Sidebar
      • Right Sidebar
      • Full Width
    • Display Post Date
    • Display Post By
    • Display Post Category
    • Display Post Tags
    • Display Post Next Previous Button
  • General Settings
    • Enable Preloader
    • Enable Sticky Header
    • Page layout
      • Left Sidebar
      • Right Sidebar
      • Full Width
    • Display Post Next Previous Button
    • Display Post Navigation or Pagination
  • Styling Settings
    • Theme Color
    • Theme Secondary Color
  • Errorpage Settings
    • Error Page Heading
    • Error Page Sub Heading
    • Error Button Text

Documentation

You can find detailed documentation on how to use Customizer Toolkits on Customizer Toolkits
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Customizer Toolkits!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the customizer-toolkits.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the customizer-toolkits.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Easy To Top.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Login to your WordPress admin area.
  • Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top.
  • Click the Upload plugin button at the top.
  • Click the Choose File button and locate the customizer-toolkits.zip file on your machine and click the Install Now button.
  • On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.
